short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Optimize your Upwork bids with Upwork Analytics! Gain insights, enhance strategies, and win more projects.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Upwork Analytics Tool - Transform how your team bids on Upwork. Designed to fill the gap in Upwork's team collaboration capabilities, our Chrome extension provides a comprehensive view of your bidding process. Track all aspects of your proposals, from initial quotations to final negotiations, and gain insights into each team member's contributions. Our intuitive dashboard lets you pinpoint successful strategies and correct missteps, fostering continuous improvement. Equip your team with the tools they need to collaborate effectively and win more projects on Upwork.
𝐀𝐈-𝐠𝐞𝐧𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐝 𝐜𝐨𝐯𝐞𝐫 𝐥𝐞𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐬 𝐜𝐚𝐧 𝐡𝐞𝐥𝐩 𝐲𝐨𝐮:
𝐂𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐞 𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐥𝐢𝐳𝐞𝐝 𝐜𝐨𝐯𝐞𝐫 𝐥𝐞𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐬: They tailor the content to specific job postings, highlighting your most relevant skills and experiences.
𝐒𝐚𝐯𝐞 𝐭𝐢𝐦𝐞: By automating the writing process, you can focus on other aspects of your job search.
𝐈𝐧𝐜𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐬𝐞 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐜𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞𝐬 𝐨𝐟 𝐠𝐞𝐭𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐡𝐢𝐫𝐞𝐝: Well-written cover letters can make a strong impression on potential employers.

𝗛𝗼𝘄 𝘁𝗼 𝘂𝘀𝗲 𝗲𝘅𝘁𝗲𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻
https://youtu.be/2FqDr-R2qvk

𝗞𝗲𝘆 𝗙𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀
𝗧𝗿𝗮𝗰𝗸 𝗘𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘆 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗽𝗼𝘀𝗮𝗹: Monitor every step of your bidding process, from initial quotes to final negotiations.
𝗧𝗲𝗮𝗺 𝗣𝗲𝗿𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗺𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲 𝗜𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗴𝗵𝘁𝘀: See individual contributions and identify winning strategies.
𝗜𝗻𝘁𝘂𝗶𝘁𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝗗𝗮𝘀𝗵𝗯𝗼𝗮𝗿𝗱: Easily visualize your agency's progress and uncover areas for improvement.
𝗗𝗮𝘁𝗮-𝗗𝗿𝗶𝘃𝗲𝗻 𝗗𝗲𝗰𝗶𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀: Make informed choices based on real-time data to win more projects.

𝗡𝗲𝘄 𝗶𝗻 𝗩𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝟏.𝟏𝟎.𝟕
𝗕𝗼𝗹𝗱 𝗙𝗼𝗿𝗺𝗮𝘁𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗶𝗻 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗽𝗼𝘀𝗮𝗹𝘀: Emphasize key points in your proposals and cover letters.
𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗽𝗼𝘀𝗮𝗹 𝗣𝗿𝗲𝘃𝗶𝗲𝘄: Review your proposal details before submitting to ensure accuracy.
𝗗𝗲𝘁𝗮𝗶𝗹𝗲𝗱 𝗖𝗹𝗶𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗜𝗻𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗺𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻: Access client budget, hourly/fixed rates, and ratings on the details page for tailored proposals.
𝐁𝐮𝐠 𝐟𝐢𝐱𝐞𝐬: Some minor fixes.

𝗡𝗲𝘄 𝗶𝗻 𝗩𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝟏.𝟏𝟏
𝗔𝗜 𝗚𝗲𝗻𝗲𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗲𝗱 𝗖𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗿 𝗟𝗲𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗿𝘀: AI crafts each cover letter to match your skills with the job title and description, making it a perfect fit.
